com.spears.wrapper

Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spears.wrapper.Admin

  • public class Admin
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for the application. Initializes the program and initiates simulation runs. Many methods in this class are protected only for testing purposes and should nto be called.

    • Method Summary
